## Table of contents

```{r, results = "asis", echo = FALSE, layout = "l-page"}
articles <- yaml::read_yaml("2021-2.yml")$articles
contents <- lapply(articles, function(x) {
  if(!is.null(x$heading)) {
    return(paste("\n\n###", x$heading))
  }
  stringr::str_glue(
"[{x$title}]({if(grepl('RJ-\\\\d{4}-\\\\d{2,}', x$slug)) '../../articles/' else '../../news/RJ-2021-2-'}{x$slug})<br>{glue::glue_collapse(x$author, sep = ', ', last = ' and ')} {x$pages[1]}\n\n")
})

cat(do.call(c, contents), sep = "\n")
```
